Sentencas: Dense ceramics with La0.80Sr0.20Ga0.85Mg0.15O2.825 and La0.80Sr0.15Ga0.85Mg0.20O2.825 compositions have been prepared by sintering of mechanosynthesized precursors.
Titulo: Single-phase ceramics with La1-xSrxGa1-yMgyO3-δ composition from precursors obtained by mechanosynthesis

Sentencas: The perovskite is synthesized after 85 h of milling in a planetary mill.
Titulo: Single-phase ceramics with La1-xSrxGa1-yMgyO3-δ composition from precursors obtained by mechanosynthesis

Sentencas: Single phases have been obtained at conditions that are not possible if traditional solid-state reaction (SSR) method is used.
Titulo: Single-phase ceramics with La1-xSrxGa1-yMgyO3-δ composition from precursors obtained by mechanosynthesis

Sentencas: The influence of milling time and composition in the reactivity of the precursors is studied.
Titulo: Single-phase ceramics with La1-xSrxGa1-yMgyO3-δ composition from precursors obtained by mechanosynthesis

Sentencas: Highest purity is obtained in Sr = 0.15 and Mg = 0.20 composition, with relative density higher than 97%.
Titulo: Single-phase ceramics with La1-xSrxGa1-yMgyO3-δ composition from precursors obtained by mechanosynthesis

Sentencas: The total elimination of typical secondary phases for these compositions, as SrLaGaO4 and SrLaGa3O7, allows the total conductivity of the ceramics to be improved.
Titulo: Single-phase ceramics with La1-xSrxGa1-yMgyO3-δ composition from precursors obtained by mechanosynthesis

Sentencas: The influence of the grain size and the nature of the grain boundaries an the electrical characteristic of the ceramics are also discussed.
Titulo: Single-phase ceramics with La1-xSrxGa1-yMgyO3-δ composition from precursors obtained by mechanosynthesis
